channel.title: 彭博-市场
channel.description: 这是一个追踪彭博-市场news的种子

item.title: 大西洋两岸的政治家们都在攻击气候政策并使其倒退，这使人们对减排的步伐产生了怀疑
item.description:
Politicians on both sides of the Atlantic are attacking and rolling back climate policies, casting doubt on the pace of emissions cuts https://t.co/UiZbBwuOr2

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 中国恒大集团创始人许家印的前妻就其次子许家印支付的 10 亿港元款项提起诉讼，这是这家房地产巨头缓慢解体过程中的最新转折。
item.description:
The ex-wife of China Evergrande Group’s founder Hui Ka Yan filed a lawsuit against his second son over HK$1 billion in payments, the latest twist in the slow unravelling of the property giant https://t.co/XcGsVSoeib

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 欧洲最大的房东之一 Heimstaden Bostad 决定暂停派息，以保护其信用评级不被进一步下调
item.description:
One of Europe’s largest landlords Heimstaden Bostad decides to pause dividend payouts to protect its credit rating from further downgrades https://t.co/CdwidYBimy

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 据知情人士透露，英国财政大臣杰里米-亨特（Jeremy Hunt）可能会在下周的预算中宣布英国将对烟草征收新税。
item.description:
Chancellor Jeremy Hunt may announce a new UK tax on vapes as part of his budget next week, according to a source https://t.co/bwle0R0VDw

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 亿万富翁高塔姆-阿达尼（Gautam Adani）的企业集团本周在印度北部启动了两处国防设施，投资额达 3.62 亿美元
item.description:
Billionaire Gautam Adani’s conglomerate started two defense facilities in northern India this week at an investment of $362 million https://t.co/Qa2FePvPoZ

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 消息人士称，阿达尼集团公司已委托银行安排一系列投资者会议，讨论出售美元优先担保票据事宜
item.description:
Adani Group companies have mandated banks to arrange a series of investor meetings regarding the sale of senior secured dollar notes, sources say https://t.co/HIu88KODLW

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 谢因权衡城市 IPO：伦敦热潮

Shein Weighs City IPO: The London Rush https://t.co/C3CpXHxFEE

item.title: 收购公司包围箱包制造商，森美家居股价大涨
item.description:
Samsonite shares jump as buyout firms circle the luggage maker https://t.co/Uf9Hbyiu9I

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 去年，Abrdn 各项业务的资金净流出达 176 亿英镑，这与首席执行官斯蒂芬-伯德（Stephen Bird）阻止客户外流的努力背道而驰。
item.description:
Abrdn saw net outflows of £17.6 billion last year across its businesses, defying efforts by CEO Stephen Bird to stop the client exodus https://t.co/JTT5vPS24J

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 陷入困境的瑞典房东 SBB 在第四季度将其房产估值下调了 2.71 亿美元，使这家正在寻求支撑其财务状况的公司的前景更加黯淡。
item.description:
Struggling Swedish landlord SBB cuts the valuation of its properties by $271 million in the fourth quarter, adding to the grim outlook for the company that’s seeking to shore up its finances https://t.co/jb7lPSl6RN

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: Orsted 任命曾在斯堪的纳维亚半岛几家最大公司工作过的资深高管 Trond Westlie 担任新任首席财务官，这家全球最大的海上风电开发商正努力摆脱巨额亏损的困境。
item.description:
Orsted appoints Trond Westlie, an executive veteran who has worked at some of Scandinavia’s biggest companies, as its new CFO as the world’s biggest offshore wind developer tries to emerge from massive losses https://t.co/0n0EV7wgGs

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 100 多万人申请首尔江南区新建公寓的三个单元
item.description:
More than 1 million people applied for three units at a new apartment complex in Seoul’s Gangnam area https://t.co/4LqrN9aDZq

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 制作尼日利亚人最喜爱的乔洛夫米饭的成本几乎比一年前翻了一番，这提醒人们注意非洲人口最多的国家面临的生活成本危机。
item.description:
The cost of making Nigeria’s favorite jollof rice dish almost doubles from a year earlier in a reminder of the cost-of-living crisis facing Africa’s most populous nation https://t.co/qnAaL6EHoN

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 激进投资者蓝铃（Bluebell）认为，英国石油公司（BP）正显示出重新转向石油和天然气领域的迹象，这应能提高回报率，但这一行动过于低调，不利于其股价。
item.description:
BP is showing signs of a pivot back toward oil and gas that should boost returns, but is doing it too quietly to benefit its share price, according to activist investor Bluebell https://t.co/WGPfVDNGoY

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 一位韩国高级官员称，朝鲜已向俄罗斯运送了可容纳数百万发炮弹的集装箱，这使普京得以继续进攻乌克兰
item.description:
North Korea has shipped containers that could hold millions of artillery shells to Russia, a top South Korean official says, allowing Putin to maintain his assault on Ukraine https://t.co/0xbTpulBFh

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 据消息人士称，菲律宾企业集团 Metro Pacific 和 San Miguel 已开始就合并其收费公路业务进行谈判。
item.description:
Philippine conglomerates Metro Pacific and San Miguel have started talks to explore combining their toll road businesses, sources say https://t.co/sAcg3TYL96

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 澳大利亚贸易部长唐-法雷尔（Don Farrell）相信，对中国葡萄酒出口征收高额关税的审查工作将于 3 月底完成。
item.description:
Australia’s Trade Minister Don Farrell is confident that a review of heavy tariffs on wine exports to China will be completed by the end of March https://t.co/qGzCZYvVml

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 印度央行政策委员会中唯一一位呼吁降息的成员表示，他的同事们将利率维持在过高水平，这可能会抑制经济增长
item.description:
The only member of the RBI's policy committee calling for an interest rate cut says his colleagues are keeping rates too high, which could stifle economic growth https://t.co/3e2aKs0ZOo

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 瑞典投资公司 EQT 克服筹资市场困难，为其有史以来规模最大的私募股权基金筹资 220 亿欧元
item.description:
Swedish investment firm EQT raises €22 billion for its largest-ever private equity fund, overcoming a difficult fundraising market https://t.co/tDEkScWw2F

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 尽管有一揽子制裁措施，欧盟贸易继续流向俄罗斯
item.description:
EU trade continues to flow to Russia despite sanctions packages https://t.co/3G8Xnktgsb

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 迪拜政府计划通过首次公开募股（IPO）出售迪拜公共停车场业务 25% 的股份，推进私有化计划以促进资本市场发展
item.description:
The Dubai government plans to sell a 25% stake in the city’s public parking business in an IPO, pushing ahead with a privatization plan to boost its capital markets https://t.co/TgWU3VhRgR

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 尼日利亚央行行长奥拉耶米-卡多佐在做出首个利率决定时将面临最大的考验
item.description:
Nigeria’s central bank Governor Olayemi Cardoso faces his biggest test yet when he delivers his first interest-rate decision https://t.co/raOzZq7zBz

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 阿里巴巴领投了中国人工智能初创企业最大的一轮融资，这是阿里巴巴一连串大手笔投资中的最新一笔，表明这家电子商务公司正再次部署资金以寻求增长
item.description:
Alibaba led the largest single financing round for a Chinese AI startup, the latest in a string of sizeable investments that suggest the e-commerce firm is again deploying capital in the hunt for growth https://t.co/6rd2ri7ns6

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 瑞穗银行本月在孟买豪华的瑞吉酒店展示了其商业关系，突显了其在印度日益增长的立足点。
item.description:
Mizuho’s showcase of its business ties at Mumbai’s luxury St Regis hotel this month underscores its growing foothold in India, a market that has lately been endorsed by Wall Street giants https://t.co/0TRbScXe6W

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

Five things you need to know to start your day in Europe https://t.co/2eHKt7MyWx

item.title: 乔-拜登总统表示希望谈判人员能尽快使以色列和哈马斯在加沙地带的战斗暂时停止，并称停火最快可能在下周一开始。
item.description:
President Joe Biden expresses hope that negotiators will soon secure a temporary pause in the fighting between Israel and Hamas in the Gaza Strip, saying that a cease-fire could begin as soon as next Monday https://t.co/y3wG5c62YF

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: Make UK 首席执行官斯蒂芬-菲普森（Stephen Phipson）呼吁改变资本支出规则，并建议如果财政部反对，则应将其拆分
item.description:
Make UK CEO Stephen Phipson called for rules on capital spending to be changed, suggesting that if the Treasury objects, it should be split https://t.co/7whOjbkOHQ

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 利奥汽车股价在香港飙升，因为乐观的财报显示这家电动汽车制造商在竞争激烈的中国市场大有可为
item.description:
Li Auto shares soar in Hong Kong after upbeat earnings showed the electric-vehicle maker is showing promise in China’s hyper-competitive market https://t.co/NvvTeuwYYr

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 新消息：@MumbiGitau 写道，一部追踪可可豆原产地的新法律有可能使巧克力、护肤品和草药的价格大跌。
item.description:
NEW: A new law tracing the origin of cocoa beans threatens to jolt the prices of chocolate, skin-care products and herbal medicines, writes @MumbiGitau https://t.co/fPUzbLvXMe

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024
